warn.title: Warn Message
warn.hint: Please right click to use the contextual menu to apply required changes.

messages.setDefaultActorManually: You have set the Community '{name}' as active for this world.
messages.setDefaultActorAutomatically: The Community '{name}' has been automatically set as active for this world.

messages.warnTooManyCommunityActors: Warning, there is {size} Communities in this world. The system can't guess the good one. Please set it manually in the Community Sheets.

dialog-box.title: Recover Hope point(s) from Fellowship
dialog-box.required-hope-points: How many points do you want to recover ?

warn.one-community_actor_expected: One and only one Community Actor should exist in the World !
warn.not-enough-hope-points-available: Not enough Hope points available in the Pool (required: {required}, available: {available})
warn.too-many-hope-points-required: Too many Hope points required (total: {target}, max available: {max})

short.label: Short
short.noRestoredMessage: After a short rest, {name} does not recover any Endurance ({name} is in full health).
short.restoredMessage: After a short rest, {name} recovers {amount} endurance ({name} has {endurance} endurance).
short.woundedRestoredMessage: After a short rest, {name} does not recover any Endurance ({name} is wounded).
short.description: click to recover endurance after a short rest (one hour)
short.title: Short rest

prolonged.label: Prolonged
prolonged.noRestoredMessage: After a prolonged rest, {name} does not recover any Endurance ({name} is in full health).
prolonged.restoredMessage: After a prolonged rest, {name} recovers all endurance ({name} is in full health).
prolonged.woundedRestoredMessage: After a prolonged rest, {name} recovers {amount} endurance, they are wounded ({name} has {endurance} endurance).
prolonged.description: click to recover endurance after a prolonged rest (one night)
prolonged.title: Prolonged rest

roll.hope: Spend a point of hope to add

toggle.favoured: Press Alt+Click to toggle favoured state
toggle.add-remove-skill: Press Alt+Click to add a skill level and Shift+Alt+Click to remove a level.

warn.noSkillFound: The skill {skillName} in not found for actor {actorName}
warn.clickOnWeaponInstead: You should click on the weapon you use instead of the combat skill.
warn.impossibleToFavouredAWeapon: It's impossible to favoured a weapon for a character.

roll.skill: Press Click to roll the skill

tech.title: A task check roll with Tengwar(s).

extended-penalty-dice.label: Bonus/Penalty Dice Value
extended-penalty-dice.hint: enter a negative value for penalties and a positive value for bonuses

error.actorNotFound: No actor has been found with actorID: {actorId} and tokenId:{tokenId}

warn.characterHasNotBeenUsedToCreateTheAction: The action you want to spend hope point on has not been created by a Character, but by {actorName} !

error.unableToRerollPrepBattle: it's impossible to reroll preparation battle roll for token {token} because it is not a character. It's a {type}
error.itemNotFound: The item (name :{name}, type: {type}) is not found for this actor.
error.noActorAttachedToToken: Impossible to add token '{name}' to combat because this Token has no Actor attached to it. You should have deleted the actor linked to the token.

warn.combatantNotInCombat: The Token ({name}) with id ({id}) you want to make an engagement with is not part of the active Combat or is Out of Combat.
warn.combatantDoesntExistInCombat: The Actor with id ({id}) is not part of the active Combat.
warn.noSkillNameAvailableWithExtendedWeaponSe: The character {actorName} has no combat proficiency ({name}) and neither a skill name of name ({name}).
warn.noSkillNameFoundWithExtendedWeaponSelect: The character {actorName} has no combat proficiency ({name}) and has no skill with the expected name ({name}).
warn.noCombatProficiencyFound: The character {actorName} has no combat profeciency ({name}). You should either add a proficiency or use the extendable combat skill settings to add one.
warn.incompleteItem: No valid {element} for this item ({item}). You need select a(n) {element}.
warn.noValidTarget: You need to select one and only one token to attack.
warn.noValidCombatTarget: You need to select a token that is included in the Combat Tracker.
warn.noValidWeaponEquipped: You don't have any valid weapon equipped for this type of Skill ({skill}).
warn.tnIsWeird: The TN computed has an invalid value. Maybe you forgot to set the parry stat of the target ({foeName}).
warn.noTokenSelectedForEngagement: You need to select some tokens to be engaged with each other.
warn.numberOfTengwarNotCorrect: Something weird happened. Number of Tengwar ({tengwar}) is 0 or less ! This should not happen.
warn.impossibleForMonoFaction: You need to select at least one Token from each faction.
warn.impossibleForComplexEngagement: You need to select one and only one token for one of the two factions, not several tokens for both.

warn.impossibleToRollInjury: It was impossible to roll the injury on the table.

preparation-roll.message: gets {successDiceBonus} bonus dice for the fight.

result.title: Attack result
result.help: Please right click to use the contextual menu
result.paragraph: {attackerName} attacks {targetName} using their {weaponName} and deals {totalDamage} damage(s)
result.specialResult: with {quantity} special result(s) ()

piercing.title: Piercing blow
piercing.description: {targetName} needs to make a Protection Roll Test against {weaponInjuryValue} TN (edge beaten {edge}).

injuryRoll.title: Injury Roll
injuryRoll.description: {targetName} is wounded and needs to make an Injury Roll .

moderate.title: Moderate Injury
moderate.message: {targetName} suffers a Moderate Injury that last for the combat only.

severe.title: Severe Injury
severe.message: {targetName} suffers a Severe Injury for a duration of {duration} days.

grievous.title: Grievous Injury
grievous.message: {targetName} suffers a Grievous Injury and is unconscious and dying.

error.noActorAvailable: Please select an actor before using this macro !
error.itemIsMissing: Item {itemName} of type {itemType} is not available for the selected actor - {actorName} !
error.skillIsMissing: Skill {skillName} is not available for the selected actor - {actorName} !
error.missingLoremasterRole: Only the Lore Master can do this action.

SETTINGS.setPauseMessageDescription: To change the message displayed over the pause image, change the content. To have the default message, please let it blank.
SETTINGS.setSoloModeDescription: Some features are adapted to Strider Mode (eg. Skirmish stance only, community actor is simplified, ...)
SETTINGS.setAddSkirmish: Add skirmish stance to your game
SETTINGS.setAddSkirmishDescription: Add skirmish to the stances allowed even if you are not playing Strider Mode (Solo)
SETTINGS.setNoneCustomCombatSpecialEffectDescript: Add a new combat special effect, called none/custom, to homebrew some situations.
SETTINGS.setTnBaseValueDescription: This setting allows the LM to set the base value they want. From the book, it is advised that you put 20 for campaign mode and 18 for one-shot
SETTINGS.setExtendedWeaponSelectionDescription: This parameter should only be activated if the Loremaster wants to use homebrew rules for combat (ie. new combat proficiencies). By activating this parameter, a new field will appear in the weapon sheet to make a link with the new combat proficiency instead of the weapon group name.
SETTINGS.setUseAdversarySkills: Allow the use of Skills for Adversary
SETTINGS.setUseAdversarySkillsDescription: In 2nd edition, adversaries don't have skills in their sheet anymore. Toggling this setting to true allows the LM to add the block back to the Adversary Sheet.
SETTINGS.setOverrideEyeAwarenessDescription: By default, max value is 24 but if you want you can modify this value to another value depending on your needs.
SETTINGS.setRawModeForActiveEffectDescription: If you need to do some specific stuff and you know what you are doing, you can toggle the Active selection mode (Checked : List mode/Unchecked: Raw mode (text input box)).
SETTINGS.setAlwaysShowShieldThrustDescription: Special Damage "Shield Thrust" : Propose this option even if the display rule (strength > attribute) is not reached.
SETTINGS.setWarnLoreMasterForCharacterStateDescri: To activate a warn message in the Chat for each character that should have a Weary or Miserable state.
SETTINGS.setShowHideRangeBlockDescription: Used to show the Distance Range Block in the Weapon sheet and Character/Adversary sheet.
SETTINGS.disableAltClickDescription: Disable the ALT Click to protect some modification actions like upgrading skill or toggling health status.
SETTINGS.aldDefaultValueName: Actor Link Data for Npc is checked by default
SETTINGS.aldDefaultValueDescription: Set up the Actor Link Data default value for new Npc Actor.
SETTINGS.setDisplayCommunityInfoAtStartDescriptio: Display, when connecting to the game, the name of the active Community
SETTINGS.setModifiedLoadAsRequestedDescription: Useful for homebrew rules that change how much carried Load relative to Endurance triggers the Weary warning. By default, the Weary status shows when Endurance is equal or less than Load. For example, to lower Load by Strength (i.e. allow Actors to carry their Strength in Load for free without affecting Endurance, e.g. put attributes.strength or integer constant value in the field).
SETTINGS.setInlineElementFromUuidInDescriptionDes: You can inline any journal page into item description. The description will be replaced by the journal content. The item description should only be the Journal link (nothing else) other why it won't work.
